I'll go straight - This game exists since 2012, and I'm a proud owner of it sice 2015. The anticheat system is a complete disaster. The new "Trusted Mode" was blocking OBS and much more streaming tools which are legitimate and verified, but when it comes to exteral scrpits other than this - it can't even detect it. Just look at the speed that cheaters are banned from Faceit, which is external launcher for CSGO matchmaking, and compare it to just the VAC. You can't evenn launch faceit while using any cheats, meanwhile i official CS - you can play for more than even a month on spinbots and other type of scripts. 
Let's mention next thing - Prime. Back when they launched it, you had to confirm your account with your phone number to get it. Now you just need to get 20th level in-game which is basically nothing special to do. Valve made it F2P, ad gave basically nothing, except for some useless badge for players who bought CS before Danger Zone update. Personally I think that CS should be back to P2P system, and prime should be rewarded for veryfing your account with phone number, because if you'll verify next accunnt with same number to get prime it bans all accounts connected to this number. 

So, a quick message to CS Dev's:
Please, just TRY to make a better anticheat system, or bring back phone verification for prime.
